name: Whack-That-Toe
description:
Please Note:
This is a two player local multiplayer game. Playing it alone makes no sense whatsoever.

A single player mode against the computer is planned, along with different game modes and other features.

Controls

Player x: keypad or mouse (or touch)

Player o: imagine there was a keypad on WASD (example with English layout)

QWE ASD ZXC Attribution
  • Made with Löve 
  • GLOBAL_lock
  • Middleclass
  • Hump
  • SUIT
  • Monogram font
  • JSFXR

Source code

Issue tracker

Theme of the 8th Klagenfurt Game Jam

Unusual Combination

Diversifiers
  • Better together - Have your game support multiple players - local two player
  • One minute showdown - A game round lasts precisely one minute - rounds typically < 1 minute
  • It speaks! - Give your game a voice
  • Different every time - Procedural generation is used in the game - where the @ moves is random
  • Environmental Storytelling - Tell the story through your game environment
  • Persistency is key - Have a persistent game state
  • Inclusivity - Add accessibility options - accessible to colour blind, multiple input options
